name: Among Guys
description:
Among Guys is a 4 - player local multiplayer game. I tried to recreate the block party minigame from fall guys with among us characters.  Hope you enjoy : )

Controlls:

--> WASD / Left Thumbstick to move

--> Space / A to jump

--> Enter / Start button to Ready!

Credits:

The UE4 Multiplayer Playlist by Dev Enabled helped me to create the local multiplayer system (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9z3tc0RL6Z7rISWe-r5DyPopRPJWaITF)

Background Music "Starting Up" by Melodic Pictures provided by freesoundtrackmusic.com

Softwares Used:

-->Unreal Engine

-->Blender

-->Inkscape
